TITLE: burn the avr bootloader microcontroller firmware reg
MAIN_CONTENT: can program bot use two methods- .by use avr bootloader gui .by usingnex avr usb isp stk in first method can program the bot by use only the usb cable no other isp programmer be need and be strongly recommend that only use this bootloader method for programming robot but if use nex avr usb isp stk programmer with the robot then boot section code may get erase and robot will no longer support boot loading if again wish to program the bot usingavr bootloader gui can follow this step to burn again the bootloader step -download this bootloader filem mhz._usbuart .a and save on desktop note follow step be the same procedure that follow while use nex avr usb isp stk programmer to program the bot step -plug thenex avr usb isp stk to pc and then connect to robot and switch on in step assume that have already instal the avrdude if not please install and continue step -open the cmd and type the follow command without the mention single quote and press enter avrdude -c stk -p -p nex usb isp -u flash \users\administrator\desktop\m mhz usb uart .a ----it will take minute for avrdude to write and verify the bootloader inthe configurable boot memory section of the micro controller after writing be finish can remove thenex avr usb isp stk from bot and switch off the bot ----now can follow the same step provide in the manual for program the bot use theavr bootloader gui final note- have proper prior knowledge in boot loader operate principle programming usingnex avr usb isp stk follow this step with caution all the good friend

TITLE: battery and jack connection
MAIN_CONTENT: for make battery connector and power jack connection for atmega development board follow the follow instruction instruction for make battery connector first take the cable and connector do n't forget to take out heat sink tube from cable before soldering.solder the cable to the connector make sure to keep color combination red for positive black for negativethen let the soldered connection cool and place the heat shrink tube over the soldered connection and shrink the tube by use solder iron battery monitoring moduleconnection connect the battery monitoring module to battery as show below ensure that -tive terminal of battery be connect to black terminal of battery as connect buzzer will beep instruction for power jack connection for atmega development board solder the cable to the jack as show below connect the positive cable red color to the inner side of jack and outer side black cable with the negative side of jack note that cable for power jack be not provide in the kit have to connect power to motor driver and atmega devlopment board two connection so use perf board green connector for distribute power yantra team pin

TITLE: understanding system think and classical control system theory
MAIN_CONTENT: in real world there be many complex system can be man make like airplane satellite rocket or natural like human body green house effect so to understand these try to make abstract model and break complex system into various system for example see human body as various system like circulatory system nervous system respiratory system and so on this abstract level of thinking be call system think main idea of system thinking be take from control system theory peter m. senge author of the fifth discipline try to explain difficulty in learn this new language of system thinking and same applie to control system also please read the follow page from peter m. senge 's the fifth discipline book system_thinking.pdf similarly classical control system theory consist of various new idea and tool these tool help to view the world in new light in abstract domain so to be familiar with the control system idea and tool please go through the lecture by brian dougla these be very interesting lecture on classical control system and what like about these lecture be make understand various term of control theory with various example and beautiful diagram yantra team

						 						 	 					 piazza make easy to post announcement to the entire class anytime by post announcement on piazza can see any response to the announcement all in one place rather than let fill inbox 							 to post an announcement click new post and select the note tab which let create post that do not require response to make the announcement to the entire class immediately regardless of email setting just check the box label send immediately to the entire class all member of the class will receive an email notification of the post right away 's great way to get important information out fast 							 						 						 	 					 piazza 's private post make easy to keep all instructor dialogue in one place when create new post check the box label make this private question when an instructor add private post only other class instructor can view look for the blue private label in the question feed on the left 							 student can also create private post when student create one only that student and the class 's instructor can view the post student create private post be useful for ask question when the student be unsure whether the material may be share with the entire class if the post contain information that the entire class would benefit from an instructor can always make the private post public use the menu that appear leave of the question 's title in the question feed 							 						 						 	 					 as soon as ve enrol class let student know be active on piazza by add couple announcement 							 the first few post be great opportunity to share basic information about the class like when office hour be and how can be contact many instructor also like to lay out the ground rule for post question and answer on piazza 							 add new post by click new post at the top of screen and filling in the detail select the note tab if be post an announcement and do n't require response 							 						 						 	 					 click good question or good answer to encourage student to ask question and respond to classmate question 	 					 						 						 	 					 piazza question and answer be like wikipedia anyone can contribute to collaboratively edit question and answer be far easy to read and comprehend than long thread of comment 							 the answer to each question be divide into student answer for all student to edit and an instructor answer for all instructor to edit when read good student answer click good answer to endorse itthis help encourage student to answer other question plus when student see the checkmark over the student answer icon in the question feed know that that endorse student answer be just as good as any instructor answer 							 another good way to encourage student to edit the student answer be to refine what other TITLE: welcome to piazza
MAIN_CONTENT: piazza be q&a platform design to get great answer from classmate and instructor fast ve put together this list of tip may find handy as get start ask question the good way to get answer be to ask question ask question on piazza rather than email teaching staff so everyone can benefit from the response and so can get answer from classmate who be up as late as be edit question and answer wiki-style.think of piazza as q&a wiki for class every question have just single student answer that student can edit collectively and single instructor answer for instructor add followup to comment or ask further questions.to comment on or ask further question about post start followup discussion mark resolve when the issue have be address and add any relevant information back into the q&a above go anonymous.shy no problem can always opt to post or edit anonymously tag posts.it's far more convenient to find all post about homework or midterm when the post be tag type before key word to tag click blue tag in post or the question feed to filter for all post that share that tag format code and equations.adde code snippet click the pre or tt button in the question editor to add pre format or inline teletype text mathematical equation click the fx button to access the latex editor to build nicely format equation view and download class detail and resources.click the course page button in top bar to access the class syllabus staff contact information office hour detail and course resourcesall in one place contact the piazza team anytime with question or comment at team@piazza.com love feedback

TITLE: collector bot
MAIN_CONTENT: dear finalist congratulation please note the follow point during the implementation in final will not be award mark for fv unless mark the current target in blue colour in rep remember that there be bonus mark of allot for realistic emulation of the scenario in rep the rule under re position rule which say if fruit in collection area be displace be place back in the original location if this be cause by collision with cb team will be penalize accord to the judging and score parameter be replace with the new rule if in any case fresh fruit get displace fall and feel that will not be able to detect further then yantra team will remove the displace fresh fruit on request if the displace fresh fruit be not remove the penalty will be incur on collision with cb or truck all team should use pwm great than for truck 's black line follow also make sure that the truck stop at all the collection station for only second and not more than that make sure that fully charge the truck and cb before the run should strictly follow the re position rule as mention in rulebook be not allow to change the position of the fruit as mention in the rulebook the run will end if display the text fruit collect on pop up window in rep no mark will be award after display the same penalty be incur each time when the cb touches/ displace any other object in the arena except the current target e.g. even if any part of cb touch the already collect fruit or truck then the penaty will be incur all the good pin

MAIN_CONTENT: dear participant as lot of participant be face the battery relate issue be extend the deadline of the task till th jan team who have already submit the task can improve solution and who have submit the task well and good before the th jan willdefinitely get some bonus mark may know have very less time to complete the theme here be some important task need to understand and complete waypoint navigation after completion of drone hold complete the waypoint navigation of drone give some waypoint in the code and navigate the drone to those waypoint challenge navigation of drone in the corner waypoint of frame hint set some offset for the corner case land the drone on static marker after complete the first point try to land the drone on static marker fix the marker somewhere in the arena and try to land the drone on that marker again change the position of marker and so on challenge when two marker be in the frame correct identification of drone marker and second marker static when one marker overlap on the another there will be no detection for single marker because target be change from to hint use the whycon reset service to change the target in run time line path follow of runner write code for runner that runner follow the path give in the runner list have write the code for ease and can download the code from here line_follow_sparkv.zip this folder contain the code block project challenge thresholding of the sensor.hint carefully analyse the sensor value and decide the thresholding landing of drone while runner be move try to land the drone while runner be move in the arena first try without cave challenge increase the accuracy of drone to land when runner be wait at node for second hint use the laser sensor on drone and whycon coordinate datum with filter to check drone be on the above of runner action when runner enter into cave detection of cave from code take appropriate action challenge detection of cave because there be no marker on the cave hint can choose accrode to accuracy detection of drone sucessfull landing on runner use sensor have to detect the landing of drone on the runner runner should stop when drone land on the runner challenge placement of sensor on runner to detect the landing of drone hint check the scoring formula and make the effort accord to time and acrruracy complete the above task one by one for theme implementation team who be face the problem due to battery of drone can start perform the task mention in step all the good pin

MAIN_CONTENT: respected sir although try good be not able to do the task- in the give time now past the deadline so want to sumarise all the problem that face while do the task so that atleast can get to know where go wrong and what be the good way to approach the problem be easily able to maneuver the drone through python code since the begin hard code version of code armed disarm make the drone reach hieght and move in various direction easily.- so next step be to apply the pid algorithm observation the maximum error be get in any case be so the value of the derivator term be always in between in any case for start the pid tuning avoid take in the integral part as be summission of all the error upto give point which usually come out to be very large so pid error derivator now start tune with an initial value of and which have use for tuning of virtual drone- the resultant pid come out in the range of but the value require for motion of drone should be in between so make an equation such that output send to the motor pid some constant value so now observe that this value varied for different axis and for different quadrant for eg require be different for axis and -ve axis so code as such so as to provide differnt value for different axis and different quadrant so start tune drone for one axis at time but while determine the perfect value of this the battery usually discharge and once change the battery the value of change so everytime change the battery would tune the drone just again determine the value of again for all the axis anew and these value be always different so assume that change the battery effect the value of so after tune the drone in each axis for give battery would run code for combined value for both and for the drone to reach the setpoint and drone do usually reach setpoint but when enhance the code for hold the drone would not hold would start oscillate and sometimes exbhite random behaviour but usually uptill this point the battery would discharge and repeat the process again for new battery persist the same thing for few day without any result then on one of the run observe that the value of be change accord to the point where tune from i.e if be tune the drone from point which be near to the setpoint then the value of require be high while if the tuning of be do from far point then the value of would be less.- thus the observation be make that when point be quite far from the set point the error be large thus pid value be large for this point so from here drone require comparitively less speed to stably reach the set point while when point be close to setpoint the pid value be not large enough to make the drone reach the setpoint so the value of require here be large so now be require to modify the code as such so let take the case of ve axi for this output pid value so now when pid value be small the drone get high magnitude for motion while for far away point the pid value would be large and thus would move slowly and stably to destination this strategy work but only for half of the plane and lot ambiguity exist resultantly now the drone be not even reach the setpoint properly let alone hold there in the whole case also work for varied value of and use rqt_plot for ensure fine tuning and research lot abot pid tuning of drone but without any fruit and discharging of drone battery in just minute be major issue so the whole process be very tiresome and fruitless as finally be not able to submit any video work really hard for this task so through this post just expect few remark as MAIN_CONTENT: dear participant here be couple of guideline before task release as inform early task original configuration will be available for download frommidnight ndfebruary to midnight thfebruary .once download the original configuration countdown timer of hour will start will have hour from time offirst downloadto submit solution for this original configurationwithout any penalty code submission code submission instruction will be give with original configuration download need to clean up work code accord to the code standard give on portal code submission final deadline be midnight th february bonus configuration bonus configuration will be available for download to team who have submit the video demonstration even with penalty for the original configuration.bonus configuration will be evaluate only if have working solution for the original configuration can submit the bonus configuration till midnight february th when the competition close no extension will be allow midnight february th be the hard deadline for the competition original bonus and code should be submit before that be careful of when download the original configuration since will dictate how much time get for bonus configuration for example if download the original on rd feb at pm will get till th feb pm to submit without penalty if submit at pm will get till th pm to submit bonus and code however if download the original on th feb at pm and submit on th feb pm will get hardly enough time to shoot and submit the bonus so plan accordingly do n't download too late or too early in the original configuration the starting position and orientation of robot will be give along with position and colour of plant be allow to initialise the start position of robot in the code but be not allow to hardcode the position of plant in the code robot algorithm should be dynamic enough that regardless of the start position of robot the run should work perfectly do n't forget the plant colour indication use rgb lead before robot fertilize weed plant should indicate the color of the plant by glow the corresponding color on the rgb lead make sure the lighting condition shoot the video be TITLE: color sensor interface
MAIN_CONTENT: since lot of student be have problem with color sensor interface with spark here 's some more help as mention earlier have to configure timer input capture mode to capture the pulse from the colour sensor below give be small snippet of code which will help you.but do n't copy paste blindly understand what do volatile unsigned long int pulse volatile be important unsigned long int red variable to store the red pulse count unsigned long int blue variable to store the blue pulse count unsigned long int green variable to store the green pulse count void color_sensor_pin_config void 	 ddrd //set pd as input for color sensor output 	 portd //enable internal pull up for portd pin 	 ddrc //initialise pin connect to as output portc set pin as low initialially void color_sensor_pin_interrupt_init void //interrupt enable 	 cli //clears the global interrupt 	 timsk timsk enable input capture pin of timer for color sensor 	 sei enable the global interrupt isr timer capt_vect 	 pulse //increment on receive pulse from the color sensor void timer init void 	 tcnt 	 tcnt 	 ocr ah 	 ocr al 	 ocr bh 	 ocr bl 	 tccr 	 tccr //at clock frequency 	 timsk complete the above code and try to capture pulse from the color sensor and display on the lcd or xctu console after work implement the logic for color detection word of caution timer be be use by both color sensor and motor both have different initialisation before the function to sense color must call the timer init function after sense be complete reinitialise the timer as per require for motor control and disable input capture mode pin

TITLE: servo interface hack
MAIN_CONTENT: hey guy here be another tutorial for servo interface since lot of student be face troubleinitilalize the bit timer for servo here be nifty hack can use though must warn hack so may do the job for but 's stillimportant to learn how to initialize timer and stuff so before start need to learn how the pwm signal generate for servos work so must be know the normal pwm mode for control speed of motor here the duty cycle be the most important component the amount of power deliver to the motor hence speed of the motor depend on the duty cycle in case of servo motor be different for servo motor the length of the t_on pulse determine the angle of the servo the t_off pulse usually have an almost constant length vary between ms for example if give t_on pulse of ms the servo will rotate to degree if give t_on pulse of ms the servo will rotate to degree so to get any angle between degree need to map the value to pulse length between ms so now get how the servo pwm work can write code to generate signal void servo pin_config void 	 ddrd //making portd pin output fill this out 	 portd //setting portd pin to logic fill this out void servo int delaytime 	 for int 	 		 portd make pd high 		 delay_us delaytime t_on duration 		 portd make pd low 		 delay_ms t_off duration 	 word of caution before use this t_on pulse for servo angle varie from servo to servo need to calibrate specifically for the servo be use while the for loop be run robot will not be able to do anything else do not run the servo parallely with the microcontroller like the timer initialisation do this be not advisable for actuate the servos in robotic arm which carry load the reason be that while the for loop be run the servo be actuate to the specific angle but once the loop be complete the servo become free which mean will not be able to hold that position if an external force or torque be apply on so will be not able to hold load pin

TITLE: xbee interface
MAIN_CONTENT: since have be evident that many student be have problem with xbee interface there 's some more information about this xbee act as wireless uart link between two microcontroller or microcontroller and pc as tell lot of people during the review session the first step be to configure the xbee properly follow the xbee configuration tutorial to configure the xbee properly ideally would want to configure the xbee to bps can choose other baud rate as well own discretion next will need to read more about serial communication read in detail from spark software manual and try to understand the function of all register below give be small snippet of code which will help but do n't copy paste blindly understand what do volatile char data volatile be very important define te void uart_init do n't forget to call this function 	 ucsrb //disable while set baud rate ucsra 	 ucsrc 	 ubrrl set accord to baud rate 	 ubrrh 	 ucsrb 			 //enabling receiver and transmit void uart_tx char datum 	 while ucsra te 			 //waite to transmit 	 udr datum isr usart_rxc_vect datum udr go through the code and try to transmit and receive datum from xctu console to robot pin

TITLE: hint and tip for interface hardware with spark and firebird
MAIN_CONTENT: dear participant the following be some hint and tip for interface hardware with the robot color sensor for interface color sensor with spark will need to access additional gpio to connect and can remove the lcd from the spark robot and use the pin for interface the color sensor.read about timer input capture mode in atmega to interface color sensor with atmega use the same color paper for cover the plant as the sample provide to many team in task have use othershadesof color paper which will be pain for thresholding.t color sensor for different distance range and apply thresholde accordingly the pulse count vary drastically aas the distance change sharp sensor for interface the sharp sensor with spark use the slot provide for ultrasonic sensor on the spark v. read the spark hardware manual details.you need to enable the ultrasonic sensor slot by change the jumper first before interface xbee instruction to configure xbee in at mode have be give in the hardware testing folder.for the zigbee firmware be use there be only two mode for zigbee configuration coordinator /end point configure all xbee in network as end point will work fine for communication be not necessary that one of need to be configure as coordinator.you can use any other zigbee firmware or mode as well if want.go through the experiment folder athttp //elsi.e yantra.org resourcesto study the zigbee example codexbee act wireless uart link once properly configure so read in detail about uart communicationthe firebird have uart port out of which xbee be connect on uart portspark have only one uart port so xbee and usb be multiplexe out of the same port need to switch the usb xbee jumper to switch between mode servo need to study about timer and pwm to find out howto interface servos.there be slot already provide for servo connection on spark v. read the manual and datasheet to know the timer be connect to and how to configure the timerfor the spark be recommend only drive micro servo use the robot since the standard servo draw lot of current which can not be supply by the spark battery white line follow apply proper thresholding for each of the white line sensor.you can adjust the intensity of red lead use the potentiometer provide will add more to this section as think of pin

TITLE: welcome to piazza
MAIN_CONTENT: piazza be q&a platform design to get great answer from classmate and instructor fast ve put together this list of tip may find handy as get start ask question the good way to get answer be to ask question ask question on piazza rather than email teaching staff so everyone can benefit from the response and so can get answer from classmate who be up as late as be .edit question and answer wiki-style.think of piazza as q&a wiki for class every question have just single student answer that student can edit collectively and single instructor answer for instructor add followup to comment or ask further questions.to comment on or ask further question about post start followup discussion mark resolve when the issue have be address and add any relevant information back into the q&a above go anonymous.shy no problem can always opt to post or edit anonymously tag posts.it's far more convenient to find all post about homework or midterm when the post be tag type before key word to tag click blue tag in post or the question feed to filter for all post that share that tag format code and equations.adde code snippet click the pre or tt button in the question editor to add pre format or inline teletype text mathematical equation click the fx button to access the latex editor to build nicely format equation view and download class detail and resource click the course page button in top bar to access the class syllabus staff contact information office hour detail and course resourcesall in one place contact the piazza team anytime with question or comment at team@piazza.com love feedback
